selectedCommunities.name: Search English
selectedCommunities.description:
Important Links:
Reading Section: http://reading.searchenglish.com

Hello visitor,
Welcome to Search English

Search English is an open platform for anyone to practice English like a language and develop their level of proficiency in English writing and have a better career and better life. Which is why, our slogan is “Learn English to Change life.”

People of any age or any educational background-school , college, university, business person, job holder, etc.- can come to this group and learn English writing. One can write on any topic as long as it is not controversial or offending according to our social norm.

Search English is free. We do not charge money to anyone. At Search English we  strive to develop skilled English writers.

So why English writing?

Writing in any language- be it Bangla or English- is very difficult. Writing also requires one to use more than one skill sets- reading, listening, and speaking. In order to write on any topic, the writer has to collect information from books, newspapers, internet etc. He or she might have to talk with different people to collect information.

Being a mono-lingual country, scope of speaking English is very limited in Bangladesh. However, demand of good English writers is everywhere. A person with good English writing skills will get quick promotions in his/her job. These days, freelance outsourcing has become popular in our country. In order to become a better freelance outsource person, one must have good English reading and writing skill. Finally, with the arrival of e-Commerce in our country, demand of skilled English content writer only went up.

In such a situation, we believe that our platform will be able to create a group of people who have good skill in English writing.
This Group is an initiative of Search English Limited, a Successful Startup Company of Bangladesh. 

Visit our website: https://searchenglish.com
Follow us on Social Networks- 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/GoSearchEnglish
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GoSearchEnglish
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+SearchEnglish
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/SearchEnglish
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/searchenglish
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/searchenglish
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/searchenglish

selectedCommunities.name: DIY On A Budget Official
selectedCommunities.description:
Welcome to DIY On A Budget, part of the On A Budget Network.

On A Budget is a social community for problem solvers and money savers.

Here at On A Budget we help members to save time and money, offering a safe space to learn and share new ideas.

We inspire people and offer practical solutions to solve everyday problems.
DIY On A Budget is here for all of your decorating and home improvement tips, tricks and ideas. Here you can find and share frugal examples to get that inviting home we all strive for.

This group is for DIY and home improvement related posts only. For Crafts, Gardening, Parenting, Fashion & Beauty, Travel, Cleaning and Cooking, please follow the links below:

GARDENING (& ALL OUTDOOR DIY):
www.facebook.com/groups/gardeningonabudgetofficial
CRAFTS:
www.facebook.com/groups/craftsonabudgetoggicial
CLEANING:
www.facebook.com/groups/cleaningonabudget
FASHION & BEAUTY:
www.facebook.com/groups/fashionandbeautyonabudgetofficial
TRAVEL:
www.facebook.com/groups/travelonabudgetofficial
PARENTING:
www.facebook.com/groups/parentingonabudgetofficial
COOKING:
www.facebook.com/groups/cookingonabudgetofficial

Any other groups using the On A Budget name are in no way linked to us.
Posts and photographs submitted may be used within our other On A Budget network. By joining and posting to this group, it is your responsibility to read the group rules within the announcement section. By joining it is assumed that you have read the rules and group description and agree to them in full, allowing the group to operate in the way in which it was intended. 
If you have any problems, please contact admin via our main Facebook page 
m.me/onabudgetofficial

https://www.onabudget.tv/

selectedCommunities.name: NASA - National Aeronautics and Space Administration
एक करोड मराठ्यांचा फेसबुक ग्रुप जो एक मराठा  ऍड होइल त्याने १०० ऍड करावे
selectedCommunities.description:
एक करोड मराठयांचा फेसबुक ग्रुप जो एक मराठा अॅड होइल त्याने १०० ऍड करावे .

  ग्रुपचे उद्देश व नियम खालीलप्रमाणे आहेत🚩

1) ग्रुप वर जातीवाचक किंवा कुठल्याही महापुरुषांची अवमान करणारी पोस्ट किंवा कॉमेंट आल्यास अडमीन आणि मोडरेटर पॅनल त्यास जबाबदार नाही ! त्याची पूर्ण जबादारी मेंबर ची राहील ! अस कोण्ही आढळून आल्यास कॉमेंट किंवा पोस्ट रिपोर्ट टू अडमीन करा कारवाई केली जाईल !

2)  मराठा समाजावरील अन्याया विरुद्ध वाचा फोडणे

3) या ग्रुप माध्यमातून मराठा तरुणांना नोकरी शिक्षण,व्यवसायात आणि आधुनिक शेती विषयी मार्गदर्शन करणे

4) तातडीची मदत जसे की रक्त, अडचणीत धावून जाणे आणि मदत करणे

5) मराठा समाज एकत्र करणे जाचक रूढी,परंपरांना हद्दपार करण्यासाठी जनजागृती करणे

6) 🚩 🚩एक करोड मराठयांचा फेसबुक ग्रुप जो एक मराठा अॅड होइल त्याने १०० ऍड करा🚩ग्रुप वर gm, gn, शुभेच्छा चे पोस्ट करू नये केल्यास ग्रुप च्या बाहेर करण्यात येईल

7) 🚩 महिला सबलीकरणासाठी जनजागृती,मार्गदर्शन,तसेच मदत करणे

8) 🚩शिवचरित्र,शिवविचार व किल्ले संवर्धन व माहिती घराघरात पोहचवणे

9) 🚩 ऍट्रॉसिटी मूळे होणाऱ्या अन्याया विरुद्ध वाचा फोडणे व शक्यतो तेवडी मदत करणे

10) वरील सर्व उद्देश आपल्या आहेत ह्याची सर्वानी नोंद घ्यावी*

🚩
11)  🚩एक करोड मराठयांचा फेसबुक ग्रुप जो एक मराठा अॅड होइल त्याने १०० ऍड करा🚩

12) 🚩🚩मराठा बांधवांनी आपला व्यवसायांच्या जाहिराती करू शकता ... मराठा तरुणांना रोजगार देण्याच्या जाहिराती करू शकता . याद्वारे मराठा समाजातील आपल्या बांधवाना फायदा होईल .🚩🚩
 


नियम ..लक्षात असू दया
१. आपण पोस्ट केलेला डाटा हा आपला असावा
२. आपले भाष्य अपमानित करणारे नसावे..

3.सर्व ग्रुप मेम्बरचा मान ठेवावा ..
4. या ग्रुप मध्ये VEG अथवा NON VEG पोस्ट करान्या अगोदर विचार करून करावे..
ह्या पेज चे काही नियम आहेत.. न पाळल्यास पेज वरून BAN करण्यात येईल
१) कॉमेंट मध्ये लिंक टाकून advertise करू नये
2) कोणाची personal इन्फो विचारू नये
3) मुलीना मैत्री, फोन, इत्द्यादी बाबत विचारू नये
4) शिव्या किवा अर्वाच्य भाषा वापरू नये.
5) अड्मीन शी वाद घालू नये ..ते कोणाचे दुश्मन नाहीयेत..
पेज चे नियम मोडल्यास पेज वरून BAN करण्यात येईल आणि त्यांच्या फेसबुक प्रोफाईल ची लिंक देऊन त्याची खूप प्रसिद्धी केली जाईल ह्याची नोंद घ्यावी
धन्यवाद्..

13) 🚩🚩कृपया या नियमांचे कोणी उल्लंघन करू नका🚩🚩

जय शिवराय🚩🚩🚩🚩🙏🏻🙏🏻

selectedCommunities.name: Female IN (FIN)®
selectedCommunities.description:
✅ FIN is a women-only support group with a core mission to end the culture of silence. We are a secular, no-judgment community for ALL women regardless of ethnicity, race, sexual orientation or creed.

What's next?

1️⃣ Scroll down this "About" page to read our HOUSE RULES. 

Then...

2️⃣ Go to the top of the main group page to read ALL 5 group announcements. 

To be regarded as a FINster, you MUST complete these 2 tasks and interact with kindness and respect at all times.

You are welcome to our community.
